{"blocks":[{"key":"547f5","text":"Centrifuge 6OD bacteria in 1.5 ml eppendorf (EP) tube at 4,200 x rpm for 10 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"coklq","text":"Decant or aspirate and discard the culture media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bgg1l","text":"Use 200μl  M9 medium to spirate and dis completely resuspend cell pellet and culture at 37℃ for 12h.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":100,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eq9gq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"","data":{"duration":43200,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"06BAE970275C11ECA19F07667D247A04","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"200","start":null,"temperature":"37","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"34io7","text":"Centrifuge at 15,000 x g  for 10 minute at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fouts","text":"Take 100 µl of supernatant into another EP tube and mix it with 900μl ddH2O.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10opg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8fpm2","text":"Filter the sample with 0.22μm membrane filters and inject the sample into a clean sample bottle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6vc6r","text":"HMA was measured an HPLC (Agilent 1260) equipped with a UV detector and a Welch Xtimate C8 column (4.6 × 250 mm, 3.5 µm). The samples were analyzed under the following gradient of eluent A (8 mM KH2PO4, pH 2.4) and eluent B (100% acetonitril): 5 min 10% B, 20 min linear gradient to 30% B, 3 min linear gradient to 50% B, 5 min 50% B, 2 min linear gradient to 10% B, 5 min 10% B. HMA was detected at 215 nm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: HMA determination
